author: legobrickklan_official_
title: Hmmm...
review:
Okay, so this is my first review so here we go: This set is, well, not that great unless you're, like, a crazy Star Wars fan. I like this set, but the parts are not the best. (There are a few good parts though). The only thing that urks me about this set, is that the front or [cockpit] is ugly!

The original Imperial Shuttle set contained a printed cockpit, which is way better then this idea. So I give it a 3/5 !

author: NickBrick
title: Well the cokpit is bad.But everything else is sweet!
review:
